Start by thinking about what kind of landscapes or activities interest you most. Furka Pass (Photo: Switzerland Tourism André Meier) Photo: Switzerland Tourism André Meier Do you want to focus on the Alps and drive over high mountain passes like Furka, Grimsel or Gotthard? Are you more interested in culture, food and old towns like Bern, Fribourg and Lucerne? Or maybe you want a bit of everything – lakes, mountains and cities in one loop? Seraina's Tip: Check out the Grand Tour of Switzerland app to plan your trip and read my article I wrote about the most scenic road trips in Switzerland . If you’d rather not build the route yourself and pick a pre-designed trip, there are curated road trip packages you can book through Switzerland Travel Centre.
